price: Sila isaan diliilee dalagan Nu jalaa bahuu yaaduu? Wanti isaan murteessan waa fokkate!
arabic: أَمۡ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَعۡمَلُونَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ أَن يَسۡبِقُونَاۚ سَآءَ مَا يَحۡكُمُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: am ḥasiba alladhīna yaʿmalūna al-sayiāti an yasbiqūnā sāa mā yaḥkumūna
